description:
Oh No! Someone had kidnapped your little birds! You must go on an epic adventure to rescue them!

Avenger Bird is a platform side-scroller game with pixel-art graphics, but your hero isn't just a regular hero. You are playing a bird that can flap it's tiny wings to fly and glide for a limited distances. It's retro inspired 16-bit era game with innovative and challenging fly/glide mechanic

Features:
- Explore Four Different Worlds
- Open World Map
-  32 Unique Levels
- Hidden Treasure In Every Level
- Easter eggs and Unexpected Cameos
- Epic Boss Fight At the End!
name: Avenger Bird
